title: DataGrip
description: Cross platform IDE for database tools and SQL.
howToUse:
* Connect to multiple database types
* Execute SQL queries with syntax highlighting
* Manage database schema changes
caveats:
* Requires JetBrains subscription
* Learning curve for beginners
useCases0|items:
* Connect to multiple databases
* Write and execute SQL queries
* Visual query building
useCases1|items:
* Generate reports
* Data visualization
* Export query results
useCases2|items:
* Use parameterized queries
* Create optimized indexes
* Monitor query performance
tips0|items:
* Use database schemas to organize connections
* Set up query history
* Configure result set limits
tips1|items:
* Create reusable queries
* Use versioning for schemas
* Set up keyboard shortcuts

title: Visual Studio Code
description: Lightweight but powerful source code editor
howToUse:
* Install relevant extensions
* Customize workspace settings
* Use integrated terminal
caveats:
* Some extensions can slow performance
* Requires configuration for best experience
useCases0|items:
* Web development
* Python programming
* Git integration
useCases1|items:
* Integrated terminal usage
* Multi-file editing
* Project navigation
useCases2|items:
* Recommended extensions by language
* Custom extension packs
* Extension management
tips0|items:
* Use workspace settings
* Configure autosave
* Install language servers

* Set up debug configurations
